alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Telfair, southeastern Wheeler and southwestern Montgomery Counties through NOON EDT... At 1129 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Jacksonville, or 14 miles north of Broxton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Uvalda, Scotland, Alston, Jacksonville, Towns, Horse Creek Wma, Spring Hill, Jordan, Charlotteville and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central Georgia.
